GeDBIT.dist

类 SymmetricSubstitutionWeightMatrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • GeDBIT.dist.SymmetricSubstitutionWeightMatrix
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    WeightMatrix, java.io.Serializable

    public class SymmetricSubstitutionWeightMatrix
extends java.lang.Object
implements WeightMatrix
    Implements a WeightMatrix by providing a symmetric substitution matrix of double distances for a given Alphabet. Thus, this defines a weighted edit distance on an Alphabet
    版本:
    2004.03.02
    作者:
    Rui Mao, Willard
    另请参阅:
    序列化表格

      SymmetricSubstitutionWeightMatrix(Alphabet alphabet, double[][] distances)
      This constructor provides the Alphabet and an array of double distances between the Symbol objects.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • SymmetricSubstitutionWeightMatrix

        public SymmetricSubstitutionWeightMatrix(Alphabet alphabet,
                                 double[][] distances)
        This constructor provides the Alphabet and an array of double distances between the Symbol objects. The distance array represents the lower triangle partof a symmetric matrix of distances, The distance between two Symbol objects with indices I and J will be computed by first computing R=max(I,J) and C=min(I,J) , then indexing the distance array with index R*(R+1)/2+C.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getDistance

        public double getDistance(Symbol one,
                 Symbol two)
        指定者:
        getDistance 在接口中 WeightMatrix
        返回:
        the distance between two Symbol objects in the Alphabet over which this matrix is defined.

      • getAlphabet

        public Alphabet getAlphabet()
        指定者:
        getAlphabet 在接口中 WeightMatrix
        返回:
        the Alphabet over which this matrix is defined.
